channel.title: Group Policy Preference on TLDRBins
channel.description: Recent content in Group Policy Preference on TLDRBins

item.title: SMB Enum
item.description: SMB Share Enum nmap sudo nmap --script=smb-enum-shares -p 445 <TARGET> $ sudo nmap --script=smb-enum-shares -p 445 10.10.11.207 Starting Nmap 7.94SVN ( https://nmap.org ) at 2024-09-25 04:53 GMT Nmap scan report for 10.10.11.207 Host is up (0.26s latency). PORT STATE SERVICE 445/tcp open microsoft-ds Nmap done: 1 IP address (1 host up) scanned in 7.96 seconds Anonymous Login smbmap smbclient impacket smbmap -H <TARGET> --no-banner smbmap -H <TARGET> -u null --no-banner # List known share smbmap -H <TARGET> -r <SHARE> smbclient -N -L \\\\<TARGET>\\ $ smbclient -N -L \\\\10.
